entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
